reviews.review: I love this game! The characters are awesome, and the story is great, it's also super fun to play the multiplayer with friends!

I played this game over 10 years ago. It's still a unique experience to this day. The world needs more from the Portal franchise. 

Co-Op in Portal 2 is essentially a completely separate campaign and it's loads of fun.
God tier game, even 11 years later. Need I say more?
This game is so good for: community test chambers.And with developer console you can break Portal 2.
原价买的12捆绑包，现在你跟我说半条命全家桶传送门12cs系列加一起买18我真傻逼
The portal walls are made of cum
určitě doporučuju příběh dobrý(ale pokud jste nehrali 1 tak si ji zahrajte před 2),určitě hodně srandy v CO se svym kamarádem a můžete si taky stavět sví levely takže za mě 9/10
Игра прикольная,ток новых уровней в коопе не хватает.
Um dos melhores jogos de puzzle single e multiplayer cooperativo!
Был у меня друг. Как-то раз я придлажил ему сыграть в Portal. Теперь у меня нет друзей.
actually had to look up a guide for 2 of the levels... i am ashamed

게임이 예술이다는 것을 보여 주는 게임.

Очень скучная и не интересная икра
La suite de la préquelle du meilleur jeu de tous les temps... Incroyablissime jeu.
[h1][b] Portal 2 [/b][/h1] it's good and fun, and you can share the fun even with you friends in co-op totally gonna recommend it :]
Like, it makes sense that the game is called Portal 2, cause there are two portals. But what about the first game? That has two portals too and is only called Portal. Really inconsistent, Valve.
expands heavily from the first game and is an amazing free-roam(ish) story game
el mejor juego de valve, abrazo
Probably one of the best games ever created. Honestly.

How have you NOT played this yet? Honestly, it's a game of the century. A landmark in the industry and a cornerstone of my entire being. It's a classic.
